thread.title_full: Victoria Police hunt man for possessing child pornography | Daily Mail Online

author: Tanya Li For Daily Mail Australia
title: Victoria Police hunt man for possessing child pornography | Daily Mail Online
text: Accused child porn fiend, 44, on the run with a car filled with exploitation material involving children Detectives are appealing to the public to help locate Cameron Allan, 44 The Victorian man is wanted for knowingly possessing child pornography He is believed to be driving a white Ford Mondeo sedan and heading to NSW He may be heading towards the NSW area of Wagga Wagga and Gundagai. Published: 04:58 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 04:59 GMT, 10 February 2017 140 shares comments Police are searching for a Victorian man who is in possession of child pornography. Detectives have made a public appeal to help find Cameron Allan, 44, who is wanted for knowingly possessing child pornography material. Allan is believed to have been driving a white Ford Mondeo sedan, with the Victorian registration number YVJ-107. A digital image of Cameron Allan, 44, who is wanted by police for possessing child pornography He may be crossing state borders and heading towards Wagga Wagga and Gundagai in NSW's south-east. A digital image has been released of Allan, who is Caucasian in appearance. Allan is believed to have driving a white Ford Mondeo sedan, with the Victorian registration number YVJ107 He may be crossing state borders and heading towards the NSW area of Wagga Wagga and Gundagai Share or comment on this article 140
